content: you haven t round i e when 3 sts remain between m1 and reached chart a row 92 yet m2 work sk2p with mc between m1 and m2 - or you have just finished chart a row and remove markers 92 with 3 or more stitches between m1 and m2 call them cherry blossoms page 4/8 leg abbreviations if you haven t finished chart a yet work bor beginning of round according to chart a until row 92 is finished cc contrast colour then work chart b1 finally depending on co cast on the leg length of your choice work either dpns double pointed needles chart c1 c2 c3 or c4 k knit ktbl knit through the back loop if you finished the heel back shaping while k2tog knit 2 sts together working chart b2 finish chart b2 to row 103 mc main colour finally depending on the leg length of your m1 2 marker 1 2 choice work either chart c1 c2 c3 or c4 p purl p2tog purl 2 sts together rm remove marker cuff round s round s work corrugated ribbing i e k1 with mc p1 rs right side with cc for 12 rounds or to desired ribbing sk2p sl1 k2tog pass the slipped st over length bind off with mc using any elastic sl - slip bind-off method of your choice the sample sm slip marker socks have been bound off with elizabeth ssk slip slip knit zimmermann s sewn bind-off method st s stitch es ws wrong side yo yarn over finishing soak the socks in lukewarm water remove chart key excess water by rolling the socks in a towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in ends photo emma karvonen technical tips rs shadow wraps knit https //www youtube com/watch v=u3xzz5n9kpy ws shadow wraps purl https //www youtube com/watch v=ckztlhcqhyw turkish cast-on https //www youtube com/watch v=a483hvweuve sewn bind-off https //www youtube com/watch v=ibn-01ilxpg call them cherry blossoms page 5/8 chart a call them cherry blossoms page 6/8 chart b1 chart b2 chart c1 chart c2 call them cherry blossoms page 7/8 chart c3 chart c4 call them cherry blossoms page 8/8
